CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 22, 1958, pg. 23 reads: " "Glamour Guide" Draws Them - The "Glamour Guide," which is being held at Kay Boys Club on Tuesday evening, has proven a real attraction teen-agers, desirous of learning the proper way to dress, walk, apply make-up and other social graces designed to improve one's personality. An interested group of young folk listen attentively to Mrs. Nellie Barron, leader of the "Teen Girls," and Mrs. Maudelena Johnson, leader of the "Sub-Teen Girls," as they explain the why's and wherefore's. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Nellie Barron, and Maudelena Johnson, seated, addressing group of young women seated in Kay Boys Club for "Glamour Guide" program, another version
CatSubject_tab: Kay Boys' Club (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Young adults--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Curtains--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Chairs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Barron, Nellie.Johnson, Maudelena Guess, 1899-1969.
